Package project.restaurant.controllers

Class HelpController

java.lang.Object
project.restaurant.controllers.HelpController
@Controller public class HelpController extends Object
This class will allow a user to seek assistance from a waiter and allows a waiter to accept it.
Author:
James Faraz Pete

  • Method Details

    • getHelp

      @GetMapping("/help") public String getHelp(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      This method will allow the user to request for help if they have not already requested help.
      Parameters:
      session - A method to identify a user and waiter across more than one page
      Returns:
      "help" The webpage that allows a user to request help

    • getWaiterHelps

      @GetMapping("/waiterhelps") public String getWaiterHelps(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      This method will allow the waiter to accept a users' request for help.
      Parameters:
      model - A method to identify a help request on one webpage
      Returns:
      "waiterhelp" The webpage that allows a waiter to accept the users help request

    • requestHelp

      @PostMapping("/helpRequest") public String requestHelp(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      This method will store a users request for help if they have not already requested help.
      Parameters:
      session - A method to identify a user and waiter across more than one page
      Returns:
      "helpRequested" The webpage confirming to the user that their request has gone through

    • acceptHelp

      @GetMapping("/accepthelp") public String acceptHelp(@RequestParam("helpid") Integer helpid, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      This method will allow a waiter to accept help and set the help request to 'helping'.
      Parameters:
      helpid - The ID of the help request
      model - A method to identify a help request on one webpage
      Returns:
      "waiterhelp" The webpage for a waiter to see current help requests

    • closeHelp

      @GetMapping("/closehelp") public String closeHelp(@RequestParam("helpid") Integer helpid, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      This method allows a waiter to close a help request if they have completed the help request.
      Parameters:
      helpid - The ID of the help request
      model - A method to identify a help request on one webpage
      Returns:
      "waiterhelp" The webpage for a waiter to see current help requests

    • confirmCancel

      @PostMapping("/confirmCancel") public String confirmCancel(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @Param("input") Integer input)
      A postMapping method for cancel button on "waiterhelp" web page. This method will change state of order to cancelled after waiter confirmed it.
      Parameters:
      session - A method to identify a user, a kitchenstaff or a waiter across more than one page
      model - A method to identify a menu item and category on one webpage
      input - is the order id of the row of the table
      Returns:
      "waiterhelp" The web page for waiter to handle current help requests
